Class: ShapeContextMenu

DrawerJs.plugins. ShapeContextMenu

new ShapeContextMenu(drawerInstance, options)

Provides context menu for moving shapes to background-foreground and remove them.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawerInstance DrawerJs.Drawer Instance of DrawerJs.Drawer.
options Object Configuration object.
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
position.mouse Object <optional>
 cursor Defines placement of context menu when working on non-touch screen.

Valid values are: cursor, shapeRightBottom,.
position.touch Object <optional>
 shapeRightBottom Defines placement of context menu when working on touch screen.

customFitViewportMethod function <optional>
 Custom function to calc coords to fit menu in viewport. Arguments : (left, top) Returns : Object with keys {left, top}

customMenuRenderer function <optional>
 Custom function to render context menu. Arguments : () Returns : Object with keys {left, top}

Valid values are: cursor, shapeRightBottom.
Source:
  • plugins/feature-shape-contextmenu/ShapeContextMenu.js, line 40

Methods

_calcCoordsToFitViewport(left, top) → {Object}

Calcualtes new coords for conetx menu to fit in viewport
Parameters:
Name Type Description
left number current menu origin left
top number current menu origin coord
Source:
  • plugins/feature-shape-contextmenu/ShapeContextMenu.js, line 302
Returns:
returns Object with keys {left, top}
Type
Object

_positionMenu(fabricItem, clickCoords)

Calcs menu position based on plugin options. click coords and object coords. Then adjusts menu position to fit viewport.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
fabricItem fabric.Object object for which context menu is called
clickCoords Coords coords of mouse click

handleContextMenuEvent(event)

Handles context menu event: finds object by click coordinates, selects that object and invokes ShapeContextMenu.showContextMenu()
Parameters:
Name Type Description
event mouse right click event or touch.originalEvent
